sense.name: report or describe minutely and distinctly
sense.examples: A document-rich exhibition detailed the life of the mercurial Jean Cocteau. The way you detailed him as more interesting than just a squid headed monster is fantastic. It detailed the risks associated with its use and how these are analyzed by international bodies. The army books have detailed them as being the finest archers in the world.

sense.name: decorate or furnish
sense.examples: She detailed the quilt with colorful applique. The thing that won me over even more was the fact that they detailed the car.

sense.name: assign to a particular task
sense.examples: I detailed him as my Junior Travel Aide for the great occasion. The ambulances were detailed to the fire station.
